title: College World Series 2025 score: LSU's Kade Anderson makes argument for No. 1 pick with shutout win in Game 1 - Yahoo Sports
summary: LSU's Kade Anderson delivers a standout performance in Game 1 of the Men's College World Series, bolstering his case for the No. 1 pick in the 2025 MLB Draft.
why_matters: Kade Anderson's performance in the College World Series highlights his potential as a top MLB draft pick, showcasing his skill on a national stage.
